articles.author: Catherine Bosley
articles.title: Asian Stocks Show Early Gains Into BOJ, Fed Week: Markets Wrap - Bloomberg
articles.description: European stocks look poised for early gains after a strong Asian session, kicking off a week of major central bank decisions and big tech earnings. The yen climbed.

articles.author: Express Web Desk
articles.title: Europe’s JUICE probe set for close encounter with Earth before journey to Jupiter - The Indian Express
articles.description: Launched in April 2023, JUICE is Europe’s first mission to Jupiter, tasked with studying the planet and its largest moons.
articles.content: European Space Agencys Jupiter Icy Moons Explorer (JUICE) is gearing up for a pivotal maneuver in its mission to the gas giant.Scheduled to fly past Earth on August 20, 2024, the spacecraft will come… [+2618 chars]
